data.name: Dwarf
data.description:
Ironforge Dwarf

Units:
+2 armor
-10% attack rate

Buildings:
+10% hit points

Upgrades:
+2Lv Building Armor

Magic:
Holy Radiance (100 HP in 200 AoE)
Thunder Clap (100 damage in 200 AoE)
Stoneskin (+6 armor to 1 unit)

Traits: What they lack in magic and spells, Dwarves make it up in their ingenuity. Weak starting units, but powerful late game mechanical contraptions that are resistant to almost all magic effects.

Difficulty: Advanced

auras.name: Reconstruction Aura
auras.description:
+20% building HP regeneration
(1500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Repair Aura
auras.description:
+4 HP/s unit regeneration
(affects mechanical units only)
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Sharpshooter Aura
auras.description:
+20% building damage
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Runic Armor [W]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Defensive Stance
+1 level of Composite Plates

Reduces spell damage to Guardian, Rifleman and Battlepriest by 25%. Increases their hit points by 25.

Type: Anti Magic Damage
Pick this when you bored of all other bonuses. Might help against magic users like Blood Elves.

bonuses.name: Eagle Siege Engine [A]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of HE Rounds

Eagle Siege Engine replaces Steam Tank
Siege Unit
+6 damage
+50 HP
Abilities:
Mortar Barrage (Damage Spell)
(100 damage in 125 AoE)
Upgrades used:
Gunpowder
Mithril Armor
Rifled Guns
HE Rounds
Concussion Rounds
Missile Launchers
Shredder Rounds
Composite Plates

Type: Mid Game Push
Heavy hitter. Brings superior firepower to pound your enemies into dust. Certified skeleton exterminator.

units.name: Eagle Siege Engine
units.description:
Siege Unit
Strong Vs Buildings
Weak Vs Spellcaster

skills.name: Shredder Rounds (Lv1)
skills.description:
15% for 2x damage and 1 sec stun.

(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)
(has half duration on Heroes)

bonuses.name: Alliance Flagship [Q]
bonuses.description:
Skyfire replaces Odin

Special Unit (Ranged/Air/Mechanical)
-20% buy cooldown
Gets special items at Lv4/8/14/20
Role: Pusher
Can learn:
Repair Bots (Self Spell)
14-20 HP/sec when not in combat
Side Cannons (Passive Skill)
shots 1-7 extra projectyles
Repair Aura (Support Aura)
3-6 HP/sec to mechanical units
Escort Squadron (Damage Spell)
4 Flying Machines for 14-20 sec

Type: Late Game Push
Very rare flying Special Unit. Melees can't touch this. Good firepower but weak in 1v1 against other SU.

bonuses.name: Mechanic [R]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Rifled Guns

Mechanic replaces Rifleman
Ranged Unit
-300 range
+10% attack rate
+2 armor
+50 HP
Abilities:
Repair (Healing Spell)
(heals 200 HP to 1 unit)
(affects mechanical units only)
Repair Aura (Support Aura)
(+4 HP/s in 600 AoE)
(affects mechanical units only)
Upgrades used:
Gunpowder
Mithril Armor
Sharpshooting
Rifled Guns

Type: Healing
Great healer. One tiny problem. He stays in front of Tanks and dies before they need healing.

units.name: Mechanic
units.description:
Ranged Unit
Strong Vs Spellcaster
Weak Vs Melee Unit

bonuses.name: Sniper [E]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Sharpshooting

Sniper replaces Rifleman
Ranged Unit (Invisible)
-10% attack rate
+12 damage
+25 range
Abilities:
Giant Slayer (Passive Skill)
(30% to do 3x damage)
(affects strong creeps only)
Mark Target (Disable Spell)
(-6 armor for 12 sec)
(affects Heroes only)
Upgrades used:
Gunpowder
Mithril Armor
Sharpshooting
Rifled Guns

Type: Anti Heavy Creeps
Sneaky back liner. Can melt enemy beefy boys. Outranges enemy barracks, can harass them.

units.name: Sniper
units.description:
Ranged Unit
Strong Vs Spellcaster
Weak Vs Melee Unit

bonuses.name: Colossus [F]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Mortar Barrage

Colossus replaces Gyrocopter
Siege Unit (Ground/Melee)
+8 damage
+2 armor
+100 HP
Abilities:
Demolisher (Passive Skill)
(3x damage to buildings)
Obsidian Armor (Passive Skill)
(35% to block damage above 50)
Upgrades used:
Mithril Weapons
Mithril Armor
Missile Launchers
Mortar Barrage
Composite Armor

Type: Base Destruction
Surprisingly fragile giant. But if it reaches enemy buildings, then its GG.

units.name: Colossus
units.description:
Siege Unit
Strong Vs Buildings
Weak Vs Spellcaster

bonuses.name: Flying Machine [D]
bonuses.description:

+1 level of Missile Launchers

Flying Machine replaces Gyrocopter
Air Unit
-100 range
+10% attack speed
+100 HP
Abilities:
Flak Cannon (Passive Skill)
(300 damage/3 sec in 900 AoE)
(affects Air units only)
Bomb Bay (Passive Skill)
(600 damage/3 sec in 250 AoE)
(affects Ground units only)
Upgrades used:
Gunpowder
Mithril Armor
Rifled Guns
Missile Launchers
Composite Armor

Type: Anti Air
Air superiority unit. Will clear the sky for you. Also can rain real hell down bellow.

units.name: Flying Machine
units.description:
Air Unit
Strong Vs Spellcaster

(-8 armor in 200 AoE)
(does not affect Special unit)

Gunpowder
Mithril Armor
Rifled Guns
Mortar Barrage
Shredder Rounds
Composite Armor

Type: Late Game Push
If you already winning, then win more. Most games will end sooner than you can deploy this beast.

bonuses.name: Item Crafting [X]
bonuses.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power
If you like your Heroes, this makes them even better. Some races depend on them more than others, though.

spells.name: Item Crafting
spells.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Pawn Item [Z]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Strength Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [X]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Agility Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [C]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Intelligence Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [V]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Special Unit.

spells.name: Pawn Item [A]
spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Strength Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [S]
spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Agility Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [D]
spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Intelligence Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [F]
spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Special Unit.

bonuses.name: Dark Granite [C]
bonuses.description:
Increases hit points of all your buildings by 2000, armor by 2 and reduces spell damage by 50%.

Type: Anti Ultimate Weapon / Base Defence
Toughens your base. Good if you learning the game. Makes your mistakes less deadly.

spells.name: Dark Granite
spells.description:
Increases hit points of all your buildings by 2000, armor by 2 and reduces spell damage by 50%.

Type: Anti Ultimate Weapon / Base Defence

spells.name: Emergency Repair (Lv1) [S]
spells.description:
Restores 100 HP over 30 sec.
(can affect mechanical units)
(can target your enemy as well)
Cooldown: 240 seconds.

bonuses.name: We hate Heroes! [V]
bonuses.description:
No, seriously, we do hate them!

Type: Anti Hero
This is not a Hero game. Sometimes you need to stomp your foot down and show those scum their place.

spells.name: Mini Smite [W]
spells.description:
Blasts any Hero.
Deals 25000 damage.
Cooldown: 600 seconds.

spells.name: Shackles Aura (Lv1)
spells.description:
Reduces enemy Hero damage by 20% and armor by 3.
(2000 range)

spells.name: We hate Heroes!
spells.description:
Barracks and Towers deal more damage to Heroes.
You get +50% gold for Hero kills.

Type: Anti Hero

upgrades.name: Fuck Heroes (Lv1)
upgrades.description:
Gives:
+10% damage reduction
+3 armor reduction
+1000 Aura range

spells.name: Cripple (Lv1) [W]
spells.description:
Reduces damage by 25% for 60 sec.
Cooldown: 240 seconds.

spells.name: Mini Smite [W]
spells.description:
Blasts any Hero.
Deals 25000 damage.
Cooldown: 600 seconds.

towerUpgrades.name: Shredder Rounds
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage and stun
Affects: Steam Tank, Mortar Trike and Bunker
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: 15% for 2x damage, 1 sec stun
Lv2: 30% for 2x damage, 1 sec stun
Lv3: 45% for 2x damage, 1 sec stun
Lv4: 60% for 2x damage, 1 sec stun

towerUpgrades.name: Defensive Stance
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: armor and block for speed penalty
Affects: Guardian and Battlepriest

Lv1: +2 armor, 15% chance
Lv2: +4 armor, 30% chance
Lv3: +6 armor, 45% chance
Lv4: +8 armor, 60% chance

-5/10/15/20% attack rate

towerUpgrades.name: Sharpshooting
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bash for speed penalty
Affects: Rifleman
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: 20% for 30 damage, 0.6 sec
Lv2: 25% for 50 damage, 0.7 sec
Lv3: 30% for 70 damage, 0.8 sec
Lv4: 35% for 90 damage, 0.9 sec

-5/10/15/20% attack rate

towerUpgrades.name: Rifled Guns
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: attack range and damage
Affects: Rifleman, Steam Tank, Gyrocopter
and Mortar Trike

Lv1: +25 range, +4/6/8/12 damage
Lv2: +50 range, +8/12/16/24 damage
Lv3: +75 range, +12/18/24/36 damage
Lv4: +100 range, +16/24/32/48 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Missile Launchers
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: 2 missiles every 15 sec
Affects: Steam Tank and Gyrocopter

Lv1: 75 damage per missile
Lv2: 100 damage per missile
Lv3: 125 damage per missile
Lv4: 150 damage per missile

towerUpgrades.name: Composite Plates
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: armor and piercing reflect
Affects: All mechanical non-Hero units

Lv1: +2 armor, 15% to reflect
Lv2: +4 armor, 30% to reflect
Lv3: +6 armor, 45% to reflect
Lv4: +8 armor, 60% to reflect

towerUpgrades.name: Mortar Barrage
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage ability
Affects: Mortar Trike

Lv1: 100 damage in 150 AoE
Lv2: 150 damage in 175 AoE
Lv3: 200 damage in 200 AoE
Lv4: 250 damage in 225 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: HE Rounds
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage in 150 AoE
Affects: Steam Tank

Lv1: 60 damage, 24 sec CD
Lv2: 80 damage, 22 sec CD
Lv3: 100 damage, 20 sec CD
Lv4: 120 damage, 18 sec CD

towerUpgrades.name: Concussion Rounds
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: disruption in 175 AoE
Affects: Steam Tank
(affects non-Hero units only)
(slows move speed by 20%)

Lv1: 30% miss chance for 9 sec
Lv2: 45% miss chance for 8 sec
Lv3: 60% miss chance for 7 sec
Lv4: 75% miss chance for 6 sec

t1spell.name: Cannon Barrage [Z]
t1spell.description:
Deals 400 damage in 170 AoE.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

t2spell.name: Missile Barrage [X]
t2spell.description:
Sends missiles in all directions.
Each missile deals 700 damage.
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

skills.name: Alliance - Ironforge Dwarf
skills.description:
Units:
+2 armor
-10% attack rate

Buildings:
+10% hit points

Upgrades:
+2Lv Building Armor

Magic:
Holy Radiance (100 HP in 200 AoE)
Thunder Clap (100 damage in 200 AoE)
Stoneskin (+6 armor to 1 unit)

Traits: What they lack in magic and spells, Dwarves make it up in their ingenuity. Weak starting units, but powerful late game mechanical contraptions that are resistant to almost all magic effects.

Difficulty: Advanced

skills.name: Sacrifice Ritual [C]
skills.description:
Kill friendly unit to summon help.
Cooldown: 240 seconds.

15% for 2x damage and 1 sec stun.

(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)

barrack.description:

Can train Heroes
+825 hit points

+2 Siege Units

skills.name: Repair (Lv1) [Q]
skills.description:

heroes.name: King of Ironforge
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Tank

Can learn:
Thunder Clap (Damage Spell)
175-325 damage, 15-30% slow
(250-400 area of effect)

Storm Bolt (Disable Spell)
200-500 damage, 3-6 sec stun
(affects Heroes only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Rallying Cry (Support Spell)
2-8 armor bonus
(350-500 area of effect)
(affects organic units only)

Second Wind (Self Spell)
heal 400-1000 HP over 15 sec

Strongest Brother (Support Aura)
+30% damage to other brothers

heroes.name: Mountain Champion
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Thunder Clap (Damage Spell)
175-325 damage, 15-30% slow
(250-400 area of effect)

Battle Cry (Support Spell)
12-30% damage bonus
(350-500 area of effect)
(affects organic units only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Bash (Passive Skill)
20-25% to stun for 2 sec

Avatar of Stone (Self Spell)
+2000-3000 HP, +10 armor

Kindest Brother (Support Aura)
+8 HP/s to other brothers

heroes.name: Adventurer
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Support

Can learn:
Overload (Support Spell)
15-27% attack rate bonus
(affects mechanical units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Headshot (Passive Skill)
20-40% to do 2x damage
(affects organic units only)

Sharpshooter Aura (Support Aura)
13-25% ranged damage bonus

Repair (Healing Spell)
300-600 HP to 5 units
(affects mechanical units only)

Smartest Brother (Support Aura)
+8 armor to other brothers

heroes.description:
Special Unit (Ranged/Mechanical)

(200-350 area of effect)

(affects Heroes only)

launches 1-7 missiles at units
